title: Hot Water Kettle

description: hot water kettle, silver, from an English tea service (Martin Hall & Co.); probably American (not part of original set-may be a reproduction of the original); hinged lid has alighting bird as knob; spout ends in bird\'s head; gargoyle-like face at base of spout; handle has 2 ivory sections to prevent steam from heating the grip; body decorated with roses and cartouches in repouss√© and engraved work; Holiday Traditions, MacFarlane Room
